text: Teliana Pereira was the defending champion, but lost in the first round to Lyudmyla Kichenok. Irina-Camelia Begu won the title, defeating Tímea Babos in the final, 2–6, 6–4, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== The top two seeds received a bye into the qualifying competition. ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky Losers=== ===Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ====Fifth Qualifier==== ====Sixth Qualifier==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Brasil Tennis Cup - Women's Singles 2016 Women's Singles
title: 2016 Brasil Tennis Cup – Singles
